custom-sql.sql: SELECT {OAuth2Authorization.*} FROM OAuth2Authorization WHERE (OAuth2Authorization.accessTokenExpirationDate < ?) AND ( ( (OAuth2Authorization.refreshTokenExpirationDate IS NOT NULL) AND (OAuth2Authorization.refreshTokenExpirationDate < ?) ) OR (OAuth2Authorization.refreshTokenExpirationDate IS NULL) )

SELECT {OAuth2ScopeGrant.*}, {OAuth2Authorization.*} FROM OAuth2ScopeGrant INNER JOIN OA2Auths_OA2ScopeGrants ON OAuth2ScopeGrant.oAuth2ScopeGrantId = OA2Auths_OA2ScopeGrants.oAuth2ScopeGrantId INNER JOIN OAuth2Authorization ON OAuth2Authorization.oAuth2AuthorizationId = OA2Auths_OA2ScopeGrants.oAuth2AuthorizationId WHERE (OAuth2ScopeGrant.companyId = ?) AND (OAuth2ScopeGrant.applicationName = ?) AND (OAuth2ScopeGrant.bundleSymbolicName = ?) AND (OAuth2Authorization.accessTokenContentHash = ?)
